name: abyss-watcher-backend
description: Backend for static JSON files for Abyss-Watcher site

scripts.start: npm run build  && chmod 755 dist/server.js && node dist/server.js
scripts.insert: npm run build  && chmod 755 dist/utils/insertData.js && node dist/utils/insertData.js
scripts.query: npm run build  && chmod 755 dist/utils/queryByYear.js && node dist/utils/queryByYear.js
scripts.test: rimraf test/; babel ./api_tests --out-dir test/ && mocha; rimraf test/

author: Stefana Gloginic
